Serdar Akkol, MD

PhD Student

Home Updates Publications CV

Started Elmezzi Graduate School of Molecular Medicine

I have started my PhD under the supervision of Drs. Stephan Bickel and Ashesh Mehta at Human Brain Mapping Lab within the Feinstein Institutes for Medical Research at Northwell Health and North Shore university Hospital.

In my thesis project, I study the speech perception with a focus on neural oscillations and electrical stimulation using intracranial EEG.

In June, 2019
